search: Please enter name of the broker

pointStandard.license: All license information registered in the financial industry: Forex, securities, gold trading,.. is moderated by Info Finance Legal department with experiences in the Financial market through direct connection with reputable licensing authorities in the global financial market.
pointStandard.market: Evaluated by the Info Finance Market Research departments around the world on growth scale, market transparency and margin levels by the financial licensing authority.
pointStandard.business: Evaluated by the Info Finance Market Research departments based on business growth, market expansion and equity.
pointStandard.risk: Controlled by the Info Finance Legal department and the Artificial Intelligence Info Finance system that tracks and processes such as liquidity, investor deposite, customer feedback and compliance with licensing authority regulations, etc. Then, the Artificial Intelligence system collects the data and makes an aggregated assessment.
pointStandard.software: Monitored by Info Finance IT department for the stability and legality of the software, high security and high processing speed of the system, etc.
